message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for negotiation.

Alice,  $1,100,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is capped at $800,000.  I'm willing to go up to $900,000 to make this deal work.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1,100,000 represents the true value of this product, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $1,025,000. This is a significant reduction on my end and reflects my desire to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, I appreciate the concession, but $1,025,000 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $950,000. If we can meet in the middle, I think we can make this work.

Bob, thanks for your continued interest. It seems we're getting closer.  To bridge the gap, I'm willing to accept $985,000. This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects the value of the product while acknowledging your budget limitations.
